tolist(self)¶
type¶
update_box_type(self)¶

trick to let cpptraj correctly set boxtype Example ——- >>> from pytraj.core import Box >>> box = Box() >>> box.alpha, box.beta, box.gamma = 90., 90., 90. >>> print (box.type) nobox >>> box.update_box_type() >>> print (box.type) ortho

values¶

return a view as a numpy array
